title: Waiver-Wire Pickups, Dark Knights, Designated Hitters, and an Explosion of RB Catches | The Dantasy Football Podcast (Ep. 304)
description:
The Ringer's Danny Heifetz and Danny Kelly offer up some Initial Advice for your waiver wire (02:00) then cruise through a lightning round of "Thank Me Later" stash guys (15:30) before highlighting the latest offensive trend to keep in mind and favorable defensive matchups (29:30).



      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
